Service Details: Provides assistance to those with an Ileostomy, Colostomy, or Urinary Ostomy, their relatives and friends, and medical personnel and suppliers in the Ostomy and related fields
How to Apply: Membership is open to all persons with ostomy surgery, their relatives and friends, and those medical personnel and suppliers in the Ostomy and related fields
Meetings: Please call the President for upcoming meeting dates
Address & Map: 1953 Baron Rd, #101Kelowna, BC     V1X 6W2View MapQuest Map
